title: Emerald Floral Vanki Bracelet - "Adhika"
materials: 22K Yellow Gold (916 Gold). Features a central Oval Cut Emerald and ethically sourced Brilliant Cut Diamonds. Hyderabadi Polish enhances the gold's luster.
features: A contemporary take on the traditional Vanki armlet, featuring a delicate floral design with intricate filigree work. The central Emerald is bezel set and surrounded by pave-set Diamonds. The bracelet's openwork design allows for comfortable wear.
occasions: or special occasions. A modern heirloom to be treasured for generations. Can be worn at a sangeet
description: This Vanki bracelet seamlessly blends traditional South Indian design elements with modern aesthetics. The high-quality Emerald and Diamonds provide exceptional brilliance and add significant value. The intricate craftsmanship and Hyderabadi polish demonstrate exceptional artistry, making it a luxurious and unforgettable piece.
